name: it's in the picture
description:
Escape alive from the cursed mountain covered with vengeful spirits! ! ! !

■ Play time

If you get used to it, you can clear it in about 20 minutes, but there are some puzzle solving elements and a relatively high degree of difficulty.
So it takes some time to get used to.

■ Game introduction text

A junior high school girl who unknowingly set foot on a cursed mountain
Getting them out of the mountain (and unhaunted) is the ultimate goal of the game! Secure an escape route while flinching the invisible ghost with the flash of the camera
Please bring the middle school girls home safely! ! ! ! ! ! !

PS As for the title, it has nothing to do with a certain disposable camera.
